title: Create a Solr Appender
description:
Create a Solr Appender similar to appenders for other projects: https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/manual/appenders.html
	It will help index Solr logs directly to a specified collection based on configuration given in the configuration
	We can have options to leverage it as a time series collection

comments.content:
Not quite sure how this would work, but should we allow a (configurable) Time To Live for the docs going there? That way people could control how large that collection got. Or perhaps recommend it use the new time series stuff David Smiley put in. NOTE: I'm not at all familiar with David's work other than by name so don't know how suitable it would be for this use-case but we should consider it.

Also, seems to me that it should be off by default.
comments.author: Erick Erickson
